Capture explicit command sessions into deterministic markdown runbooks

Usage:
  infratrack [command]

Available Commands:
  alias       Print shell alias snippet (does not modify your shell config)
  completion  Generate the autocompletion script for the specified shell
  doctor      Run local diagnostics for InfraTrack setup
  export      Export a completed session as markdown
  help        Help about any command
  hooks       Manage hooks recording mode state
  init        Initialize local InfraTrack storage and config
  run         Execute a command and capture sanitized metadata for the active session
  sessions    Inspect completed sessions
  setup       Install InfraTrack for the current user
  start       Start a recording session
  status      Show current InfraTrack session status
  stop        Stop the active recording session
  version     Print InfraTrack build version

Flags:
  -h, --help       help for infratrack
      --no-color   Disable colored command output

Use "infratrack [command] --help" for more information about a command.
